details.Description: Developer of an online doctor consultation platform designed to schedule appointments with doctors. The company's platform provides automated appointment scheduling and storage of healthcare records including x-rays, files, prescriptions, and billing, enabling customers to take good care of themselves and their family members by consulting with doctors online without going to the clinic.

details.Description: Developer of a medical consultation application intended to provide quality healthcare that is easily accessible to patients. details.Description: Developer of virtual primary care platform designed to place an affordable, long-term primary care doctor in every American equitably. The company offers limited texting with their doctor, video appointments, urgent care with the first available doctor, and free doctor answers to any health question from a network of volunteer, U.S. doctors across various specialties, enabling users with convenient access to choose and keep their doctor to orchestrate all their ongoing health needs.

details.Description: Developer of health monitoring devices designed to track and control glucose levels. The company's product is connected to an online glucometer that keeps a record of the readings and connects patients with doctors and experts instantly for real-time guidance if the readings are out of the normal range while also providing daily essentials, enabling diabetic patients to self-manage daily food, activity and blood glucose levels.

details.Description: Developer of contact-free health monitoring equipment designed for continuous tracking of vital signs and wellness.
